title: Bank of England warns debt-fuelled AI spending boom could unravel
description: The Bank of England has issued a stark warning. A massive spending boom in artificial intelligence infrastructure, funded by debt, faces significant risks. Stretched stock market valuations are a major concern. A correction in AI stocks could impact wider deb…
content: The Bank of England warned that a multi-trillion dollar spending boom in artificial intelligence infrastructure financed by debt risks unravelling given "materially stretched" stock market valuations… [+2268 chars]
